com.semartinez.projects.choppit.model.pojo

Class RecipePojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.semartinez.projects.choppit.model.pojo.RecipePojo

  • public class RecipePojo
extends Object
    RecipePojo exists to facilitate database queries. RecipeDao methods return a RecipePojo with all nested objects, which is then converted back to a Recipe before being sent to the frontend.
